name: K Kineman
text: Despite the obvious lack of employees and the trouble with COVID precautions, this place is still trying its best to get you your food as soon as possible.

name: Sherie Loverkamp
text: Sad to hear this location is closing soon. They will be moving and be a take out and delivery only store. ðŸ˜ž

name: Nickole Bell
text: Ordered bbq wings and received the worst order of wings ever. It looked like they just put some sauce at the bottom of the container and put the wings on top. I tried to eat them but they tasted horrible!!! I wouldnâ€™t recommend this place to anyone.

name: Skunichi
text: Always good.

name: Laura Hosfeldt
text: Buffet was good. Food was delicious. The waitress was really openly mad that 12 of us came in, which I would get except there were only 2 other people in the whole store and we all got buffet? It was a little strange.

name: Debbie Potts
text: The price was a little high but the pizzas were excellent. The dining room was very clean and the salad bar looked fresh and clean. The service was fast and friendly even though it was close to closing time. I would recommend this place.

name: Jennifer Dixon
text: Ordered online and asked for ham and green olives only. Pizza arrived, no green olives, no warning. I was so excited because not many pizza places do GREEN olives anymore. Ordered the mini cinnamon rolls, they sent a brownie instead. The driver was really nice but I was definately disappointed with my order.

name: Randy Bradford
text: Great pizza

name: Angela Hazlett
text: The managers at this pizza hut are terrible people. They treat you like you're garbage and like you're bothering them. When they mess up your order, which is always, they don't want to fix it ever.

name: bubba morphew
text: Good food pretty cheap. Better $5 pizza than little ceasar

name: Joyce Holder
text: Service was terrible,  restaurant had only two other customers who had already been served, waitress had to be summoned for us to order she was over by counter laughing and talking with another employee.  Pizza served with burnt toppings, â€¦More

name: Linda Bremer-Reed
text: Delicious salad bar, and tasty pizza.

name: Tiffany Bivin
text: Had to wait 20mins because they forgot to put one of my pizzas in. Was nice and gave me $5 credit but still grrr.

name: jacob bristow
text: Understaffed but okay. The staff that was there did their best. Food was acceptable.

name: Rodney Brown
text: The pizza was good this time, but service is always slow. When order was placed online and you arrive at the time of pickup, pay, and then wait over 20 minutes to get the food. Not the first time this has happened!

name: Kristen Amaya
text: Much better service than last few times.

name: bob slager
text: 25 minutes late .from when they said my order would be done

name: Mike Bryant
text: The thin crust was perfect! I had single topping beef and they spread it out generously,  enjoyed it immensely

name: wayne bruce
text: Pizza was decent but there was a salmonella scare in the us, so they used that to not even put anything on the salad bar. No pudding, veggies I mean nothing. Took the lazy way out

name: Elizabeth Dover
text: Service was good but the place was really dirty. The bathrooms were disgusting. The pizza was nothing but grease. The hot wings were good and so was the salad bar.

name: Kaitlin Quinn
text: Buffet is good and the pizza is too! Great people working there.

name: Ezra Crider
text: Any Pizza Hut you go to , you will get the best pizza ever made!!!   The only pizza we buy is Pizza Hut pizza, the best in town!!!  Ezra E. Crider

name: caleb clayton
text: Pizza is always great. Service is mediocre to good, varies with every visit. We usually just go for carry-out instead of dining-in.

name: Aaron Wilson
text: Excellent service and the right amount of seasonings and cheese not burnt not dry crust but done right. We will be back

name: Carol Smith
text: Always good food and service

name: Jeffery Roberts
text: Ordered a simple order. 1 pizza. Was told 1 hour wait time. 3 hours later I get a call from a hotel  Bonner springs KS letting me know my pizza was there. I was next door.... poor service pizza hut. I got 1 pizza and garlic knots from Papa John's just up the road for cheaper than your pizza.

name: Nick Haynes
text: This Pizza Hut is average at best compared to other Pizza Huts in which I have dined. The restaurant is clean enough but older. The buffet is not very good typically, but in all fairness, many pizza buffets are not either. My most specific â€¦More

name: Dontae Ridley
text: I took my 30 mins break at the Pilot truck stop. I felt hungry for a pizza from pizza hut, took me 5 minutes to order and 30 minutes  (Tyler) from pizza hut the delivery driver was knocking on my truck door .. I gave him a good tip and he was gone just like that in a flash.. I will be ordering from pizza hut again thank you.

name: lacey nance
text: Good prices and friendly staff

name: Michelle Moore
text: Went on a lunch break. There was only one person working the whole front of the place so she would seat you, get your drinks, stock the buffet and run the register. Not sure there was much more help in the kitchen either as there were little options on the buffet

name: Simon Crouch
text: Good food, staff was short handed, but managed. I am a huge fan of the bread sticks.

name: Timothy Battles
text: Got pizzas for my workers... Did a great job with over 20 pizzas... Pre ordered just a few hours prior and all came through perfectly... The gang loved them

name: Karla Puschaver
text: Great customer service, good food

name: nitro 1
text: Travel a lot due to my job one place I can always count on is good pizza hut pizza thanks guys

name: Shelby Evans
text: Usually fast service and attentive waiter or waitress. Lunch buffet is decent price and they usually keep it stocked. Service varies why I gave 3 stars.

name: ikaro Karate
text: Its ok fast service

name: Crystal Cain
text: LeLe is the best waitress ever. I like eating here when she is here. She takes care of her customers. Great food.

name: Tracy Dunn
text: This was a joke. Just left lady was to busy talking about her court an personal business an food was being brought out 10 to 15 min apart an than our pizza sat on the counter for 15 min an never got pasta. She didn't even know where to take the food never again

name: Dewayne Pickering
text: Great Service, Will return!

name: Carol Richey
text: Placed order and it was on time, friendly service. Was a little greasy though

name: nobody name
text: Called local store got 800 and they had to clue the store was behind in ordersor short staffed.  Not even offered a pop while we waited

name: Bernard Steinhoff
text: Great Pizza.

name: Brittany Haney
text: The wait was like 1 hour for a simple pasta they spent a hour and a half talk in to each other in the back of if ur traveling I would recommend not going here it was probably the most horrible service I've ever received at a resteraunt

name: Scott Devine
text: The food and service was amazing, huge thank you to Kathryn for being so kind and helpful,  highly recommend!!

name: Christopher Smith
text: Great fast with your orders

name: Earnest Hamiliton
text: Best pizza in town.

name: John Bockholt
text: This place needs help in the worse way, people here are lazy unorganized, and down right rude , not only. Did we have to wait 10 plus min just to be seated,b because the staff was in back doing  god only knows what! But the waitress forgot â€¦More

name: Lynda Stankowitz
text: If i could give it zero stars, i would. Server didnt know anything about her job. Our pizza sat in the window for more than 5 minutes before being delivered to our table. Cheese was not completely melted, and one of the pizzas had almost no â€¦More

name: Kathy Montgomery
text: But here recently I haven't much anywheres,

name: Cierra Kelley
text: Rude service. Barked at after entering that the "endless" Buffett was closed. The pizza was slow to come out and greasy. A male worker brought the pizza to the table and didn't respond after we said "thank you." To top it off the women's restroom was out of order. Not worth it!

name: Alex Anderson
text: Won't take requests. Servers are rude. No place to change a child in the bathroom. Very little selection on the buffet. Not even worth the money.

name: Misty L Rogers
text: Yummy. Everthing cooked well & server Katy took her good care of us dusty travelers.

name: Cole's vlogs
text: It was a clean and friendly restaurant.

name: Terry Pagel
text: This place just never works out for us. Outs always under staffed in top of that.

name: Jessica Fischer
text: Not sure why they can't toss a couple of wings in a different sauce than the others. I guess the customer isn't always right.

name: Bobby Dunn
text: Don't do it ended up going to McDonald's after we waited for our food for an hour....

name: Samantha Summers
text: The service is not the greatest, the menu is overpriced and the food is always greasy. I live right by this pizza hut, but I'd rather go to the one over on southside.

name: Roger Schmidt
text: Good food good price

name: Tim Fowler
text: Good pizza

name: Howard Wallen
text: Good lunch buffet

name: Michael Cain
text: They make one awesome pizza, put the toppings all the way to the crust!!!!

name: Fred Rodriguez
text: Not very clean. Everytime I order for delivery they get my order wrong. When you call to tell the. They get angry like if it was your fault they made a mistake.

name: Brocktapus Tapus
text: The way I was talked to and treated on the phone makes me question why some people think they deserve to be paid at all sometimes. Didn't even order a pizza because of the conversation. Will not buy from here ever.

name: Rich Huddleston
text: I was presenoted 2 pizzas  both of which Junk I have seen Frozen pizzas with 50 present more sauce and toppings choose any other place

name: Joey Wray
text: It is an all-you-can-eat pizza buffet for $5.99. for the price you pay you can't complain.

name: Maggie Wright
text: Great buffet

name: Terb Yened
text: "Not allowed to deliver to individual people. Only allowed to deliver to a house or residence." I'm a trucker stuck at Sam's Club and I've run out of food.

name: James Goodrick
text: Tried to order online for delivery and pay with cash, the order didn't go through. I called the restaurant and the manager was of no help at all. I guess that they are so busy that they don't need a $20.00 order. Will never order from them again.

name: char M
text: Very nice

name: sue wilson
text: Love the pizza

name: scott ragan
text: Nasty and horrible service

name: Joseph Holder
text: Good pizza in good salad

name: Chris Holman
text: I'm a truck driver and I parked at the pilot truck stop for the night hoping to have some pizza and wings and they denied my service because I am a truck driver and I do not have a physical address and I dont work at the Pilot truck stop.

name: Kerrie Ann Lawson
text: Slow

name: ZANDRA CANNON
text: Not good, worker didn't want to honor special on counters. Racist trash!!!!!

name: WALTER GILMER
text: Worst people ever refused to deliver to me because I was sitting in my semi instead of the motel right in front of me which they deliver to everyday Call and they were downright rude about it but that's OK I call Domino's and they came right to me

name: Mark Girten
text: Waitress was rude.

name: Puer
text: Bad place to eat I would only eat here if it is the last place in the world

name: Shawn Trask
text: Sunday buffet available at this particular Pizza Hut :)

name: Beth Amber
text: When you run out of medium pans of dough before 7pm, say we have to wait an hour for them and don't offer another alternative, this makes you deserve this rating.

name: Franky Stevenson
text: Another pizza joint

name: Kevin Shee
text: Great service. Haven't been to Kentucky in a long while
